Louis Walsh is skeptical that Simon Cowell will really get married. In a December 2010 interview on ''The Graham Norton Show,'' Louis Walsh said why he does not think a Simon Cowell wedding will really happen: Simon Cowell is in love with himself; everybody knows that. He hasn't got time for anyone else.
